name: Madness Melee
description:
Madness Melee is a 2D madness combat fangame.

Fight through the arena mode, upgrade your character, and get to wave 100! Get a new origin and start over with another character afterwards.

Play the sandbox and experiment with every weapon and enemy present in the game.

...And there's a tutorial, but that's boring.

Controls are explained in the game.

Will be updated frequently

Getting softlocked at the origin select screen is a known bug and im trying to track down it's cause. If it happens to you, just restart the game and try again.

Discord server for updates & such: https://discord.gg/d8xz6mBAab
